title: On-Demand How-To Guide

placeholders.name: task
placeholders.label: Process, tool, or objective that needs a step-by-step guide

template: Turn {{task}} into a reliable step-by-step guide with prerequisites, checkpoints, troubleshooting, and follow-on actions.
Assumption: Optimize for first-attempt success and safety.
1. Define success — clarify outcome, DoD, and quality bar; log assumptions if unspecified.
2. Prep checklist — tools, permissions, materials, setup, safety.
3. Steps — ≤10 ordered steps with verification points.
4. Pitfalls — common failures with symptom → fix → prevention.
5. Validate & wrap — completion checks and next moves.
2. Prerequisites — bullets (tools, access, materials, setup, assumptions).
3. Step-by-Step Instructions — numbered list with checkpoints.
4. Pitfalls & Troubleshooting — table: Issue | Symptom | Fix | Prevention/Safety.
- Steps are logical with dependencies noted.
- Each step has an action or checkpoint.
Revise once if any Quality Check would fail.
